definitions.title: vb. hang
definitions.body: (NH id.; As Pi. tullû, hang up; Ar. tal=a let down, dangle (a rope, etc.); Aram. [[תְּלָא]], tlo0 hang; perh. OAram. [[תלה]] id., Lzb:386; Eth. talawa: in derived sense, be devoted, addicted, to);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[ת]]: Ge 40:22 +; 2 ms [[וְתָלִ֫יתָ]] De 21:22 consec.; 3 pl. [[תָּלוּ]] Es 8:7, Es 9:14 sf. [[תלום]] 2Sa 21:12 Kt (Qr v. [[תלא]]), etc.; Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[וַיִּתְלֵם]] Jos 10:26, etc.; Imv. mpl. sf. [[תְּלֻהוּ]] Es 7:9; Inf. cstr. [[לִתְלוֹת]] Ez Eze 15:3, Es 6:4; Pt. act. [[תּׂלֶה]] Job 26:7; pass. [[תָּלוּי]] De 31:23 + 2 t., pl. [[תְּלוּיִם]] Jos 10:26;—hang:

hang up any object: acc. of hands and feet of slain, + [[עַל־הַבְּרֵכָה]] 2Sa 4:12; [[תָּלוּי]] of Absalom [[בָּאֵלָה]] in the terebinth 2Sa 18:10; ´[[ת]]: c. acc. rei, + [[עַל]] Is 22:24, Ez Eze 15:3, Ct So 4:4, Ps 137:2; subj. ´[[י]]:, [[אֶרֶץ עַל־בְּלִימָה]] ´[[ת]]: Job 26:7.

specif. put to death by hanging, c. acc. pers. Ge 40:22, Ge 41:13 (both E), 2Sa 21:12 (cf. [[תלא]]), Es 9:14; abs. [[תָּלוּי]] De 21:23 one hanged; acc. pers. + [[עַל־עֵץ]] Ge 40:19 (E), De 21:22, Jos 8:29, Jos 10:26, Jos 10:26 (all JE), Es 5:14, Es 6:4, Es 7:9, Es 7:10, Es 8:7, Es 9:13, Es 9:25.

definitions.title: Niph
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[שָׂרִים בְּיׇדָם נִתְלוּ]] La 5:12 princes have been hung up by their hands; Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיִּתָּלוּ עַל־עֵץ]] Es 2:23 they were hanged on a tree; + 3 ms. apoc. [[וַיִּתָּל]] 2Sa 18:9 (for [[וַיּתַֻּן]] v. [[נתן]]
